title: China Fam Trip From Pacific Delight Tours Pacific Delight
text:
Marilee Crocker China Fam Trip From Pacific Delight Tours Pacific Delight 
Tours is offering a 13-day fam trip to China. The trip, priced at $2,599 per agent, features accommodations at a Ritz-Carlton and Shangri-La as well as a private balcony executive suite on the Victoria Katarina. On the trip, agents will get introductions to Beijing and Xi’an as well as a cruise on the Yangtze River. Included with the trip is 26 meals, English-speaking guides, fuel surcharges and taxes. Flights leave from LAX or SFO. For more information go to the company’s website . 0
